name: Heroes of Might and Magic III
description: Using the GOG windows version with Horn of the Abyss expansion. Comes pre-installed with HD mod.
notes: Download: https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&confirm=tHfP&id=1eAOPZbg62ucgY1_853yQLjS4-wYSwqmr To run the Complete Edition campaigns, in the launcher window: select "Heroes3.exe" and press "Create HD exe" button.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
- hota_setup: N/A:Select HOTA setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/HoMM 3 Complete/HD_Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI
    description: "Running Setup, please wait\u2026"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /DIR="C:\GOG Games\HoMM 3 Complete"
    description: "Running HotA setup, please wait\u2026"
    executable: hota_setup
    name: wineexec
wine:
  version: 4.3-x86_64
